articles.author: By Joe Duggan World-Herald Bureau
articles.title: Senator cites 'fiasco' – 59 calls between inmate and attorney were recorded – in pushing new bill
articles.description: The incident illustrates the need for a law that would ban jails from recording attorney-client phone calls, State Sen. John McCollister said last weekcq during a hearing before Legislature's Judiciary Committee. The Omaha senator included the provision in Le…
